maqras.text: On goh ki osmon sikofta savad
Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
Va on goh ki zamin gusturda [va hamvor] savad
Va har ciro daruni xud dorad, ʙerun rezad va tihi gardad
Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
Ej inson, ʙe gumon, tu dar rohi [rasidan ʙa] Parvardigorat saxt talosu kusis mekuni; pas, Uro muloqot xohi kard
Va ammo kase, ki noma [-i a'molas] ʙa dasti rostas doda savad
Ba zudi ʙa hisoʙe oson muhosiʙa mesavad
Va sodmon ʙa suji xonavodaas ʙozmegardad
Va ammo kase, ki nomai [a'molas] az pusti saras ʙa u doda savad
Pas, haloki xudro xohad talaʙid
Va ʙa [otasi] cahannami su'lavar xohad daromad
Be gumon, u dar [dunjo ʙa xotiri gunohonas] mijoni xonavodai xud sodmon ʙud
U gumon mekard, ki hargiz [ʙa nazdi Alloh taolo] ʙoznaxohad gast
Ore, hamono Parvardigoras az holi vaj ogoh ʙud
Pas, ʙa safaq savgand mexuram
Va savgand ʙa saʙ va on ciro furu mepusad
Va savgand ʙa moh cun [furuƣas] komil savad
Hatman, marotiʙu holoti muxtalifero jake pas az digare [dar masiri zindagii dunjavi] taj xohed kard
Pas, ononro ci suda, ki imon nameovarand
Va [caro] hangome ki Qur'on ʙar onon tilovat savad, sacda namekunand
Balki kasone, ki kofir sudand, pajvasta [ojoti ilohiro] takziʙ mekunand
Va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci dar dil pinhon medorand, donotar ast
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro ʙa azoʙi dardnoke ʙasorat deh
Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, ki ʙaroi onon podose ʙeminnat va pajvasta ast
Savgand ʙa osmon, ki dorandai ʙurchost
Va savgand ʙa ruzi mav'ud [qijomat]
Va savgand ʙa har ki guvohi dihad va ʙa har ki mavridi guvohi qaror girad
Marg ʙar odamsuzoni xandaq
[Hamon otasi] Afruxta az hezumhoi ʙisjor [ki mu'minonro dar on mesuzondand]
hangome ki ʙar [kanorai] on nisasta ʙudand
Va on ciro ʙo mu'minon ancom medodand, tamoso mekardand
Va hec erode az onon nagiriftand, cuz in ki ʙa Allohi piruzmandi sutuda imon ovarda ʙudand
[Hamon] Kase, ki farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Ust; va Alloh taolo ʙar hama ciz guvoh ast
Ba rosti, kasone, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca [va ozor] dodand va pas [az ancomi on kor] tavʙa nakardand, pas, ʙaroi eson azoʙi cahannam [muhajjo] ast va azoʙi otas [dar pes dorand]
Hamono ʙaroi kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand, ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] ast, ki cujʙorho zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast; va in ast komjoʙii ʙuzurg
Be gumon, [mucozotu] saxtgirii Parvardigorat ʙisjor sadid ast
Dar haqiqat, Ust, ki [ofarinisro] oƣoz mekunad va duʙora [ʙa'd az marg] ʙozmegardonad
Va ham U omurzanda [va] dustor [-i mu'minon] ast
[U Alloh taolo] Sohiʙi Ars, [va] ʙalandmartaʙa [va sukuhmand] ast
[Va] On ciro ʙixohad, ancom medihad
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo dostoni laskarijon [-i haqsitez] ʙa tu rasidaast
[Laskari] Fir'avn va [qavmi] Samud
Balki kasone, ki kofir sudand, pajvasta dar takziʙ [-i haq] hastand
Va Alloh taolo az har su ʙar onon ihota dorad
Ore, in [ojot se'ru sehr nest, ʙalki] Qur'oni sukuhmand ast
Dar Lavhi mahfuz [az har guna tahrifu taʙdil dar amon] ast
Savgand ʙa osmon va savgand ʙa sitorai saʙgard
Va ci medoni, ki sitorai saʙgard cist
[Hamon] Sitorai furuzon ast
Hec kas nest magar on ki ʙar u nigahʙone [az faristagon gumosta suda] ast
Inson ʙojad ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarida sudaast
Az jak oʙi cahanda ofarida sudaast
Ki az mijoni [ustuxoni] pust [-i mard] va sina [-i zan] ʙerun meojad
Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙar ʙozgardondani u [pas az marg] tavonost
Ruze, ki rozho oskor gardad
[Dar on ruz] Inson hec tavonu jovare nadorad
Savgand ʙa osmoni purʙoron
Va savgand ʙa zamini pursikof [ki gijohon az on sar ʙarmeovarand]
Be gumon, in Qur'on suxani cudokunandai haq az ʙotil ast
Va [suxani] hazlu ʙehuda nest
Onon [kofiron] pajvasta hila va najrang mekunand
Va man [niz] hila [va tadʙir] mekunam
Pas, kofironro muhlat deh, [va] andake rahojason kun [to ƣarqi gunoh ʙosand]
